text: I'll Get By is a 1950 American romantic musical comedy movie directed by Richard Sale and is the remake of 1940 film Tin Pan Alley. It stars June Haver, Gloria DeHaven, William Lundigan, Dennis Day, Thelma Ritter, Steve Allen and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1951. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1950 romantic comedy movies Category:1950 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Sale Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:1950s English-language movies
title: I'll Get By (movie)
